教授人好教得也好
很有收穫
老師人很好，很耐心聽取學生意見，謝謝老師的教導！
Professor Hsu always gave us clear and specific instructions in terms of writing, and she is also a lovely mentor who cares about our learning condition a lot. Overall, thank you, Professor Hsu.
